💼 Requirements:

• 5–7+ years of experience as C++ developer
• At least 1 year of experience with Java or Python 🔧
• Good English communication skills 💬
• Opportunity to US onsite

If you have a US dream 🌟 and thrive in a fast-moving environment or know someone who would be a great fit, feel free to get in touch! 🤝😊

Hiring: Python Developer (LLM/ML) – Short-Term Contract (3 Months) | 100 Openings | Immediate Start

A US-based AI research accelerator, is seeking top-tier Python Developers with strong coding fundamentals and competitive programming excellence.

Role Overview:
- Role:
– LLM/ML
- Duration: 3 Months (Immediate Start)
- Work Mode: Remote
- Experience: 4+ Years
- Availability: 40 hrs/week + 4 hrs PST overlap
- Locations: India, Pakistan, Nigeria, Kenya, Egypt, Ghana, Bangladesh, Turkey, Mexico

Key Requirements:
- 4+ years of professional
development experience
- Strong in
, NumPy, AsyncIO, FastAPI
- Solid understanding of DSA, system design, and performance optimization
- Experience in
/ Data Science
- Proven performance on platforms like LeetCode, Codeforces, HackerRank, Kaggle (top ratings preferred)

Nice to Have:
- Experience with distributed systems, APIs, or data pipelines
- Cloud exposure (AWS/GCP/Azure) and CI/CD familiarity

What You’ll Do:
- Build and optimize Python systems for large-scale AI/ML pipelines
- Write clean, modular, high-performance code
- Work alongside global AI research teams

Interested? Share your resume and competitive coding profile links (LeetCode/Codeforces/Kaggle) in DM or email () I’m
